name: Thanos the Game (press A to destroy half the universe)
name_original: Thanos the Game (press A to destroy half the universe)
description:
Thanos the Game (press A to destroy half the universe) is a game developed by NerdinaNutshell. It was originally released in 2018.
You can play Thanos the Game (press A to destroy half the universe) on PC, macOS and Linux. The game is sold via itch.io.
